summary: Now heals non-hostile units if they remain inside the circle.
descriptionHtml:
[B][CENTER]Guardian Circle Revamp[/CENTER][/B]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Tn9kzxO.png[/IMG][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Undead up to level 35 entering the circle will flee. Heals everyone 20 health per second inside it.
Base Magicka Cost: 716
Skill Level: Master (100)[/CENTER]

Guardian Circle's original effect did not heal allies and the listed effects were not altered by any perks. This combined with the long casting animation means it was ultimately less effective than a combination of high level healing spells and Circle of Protection, with the latter combination repelling higher level undead and healing much more than Guardian Circle.

This MOD is to give fans of the healer persona a unique and more practical spell effect for the time and effort they invested in the Restoration school.

[B]Notes:[/B]
Version 1.1
[List]
[*] Heal now correctly increases with perks. [/List]
Version 1.0
[List]
[*] Now heals non-hostile units if they remain inside the circle. [/List]
author: iConvalescence
